feeder_sarsa_training.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 """
4 Training script for the SARSA learning algorithm.
5 Execute as a standalone python script to train the Q table
6 
7 REQUIRES:
8 The robot_emulator_server.py to be running
9 env.py, csv_interface.py and robot_stepper_clinet.py in the same directory
10 
11 OUTPUTS:
12 The fully trained Q table and the relevant policy on screen and as .csv files in the same directory
13 If run through launch file, .csv files go to tejas/resources directory, else .csv files go to same directory as script
14 
15 SOURCE:
16 https://medium.com/swlh/introduction-to-reinforcement-learning-coding-sarsa-part-4-2d64d6e37617
17 """
18 
19 import sys
20 import numpy as np
21 import random
22 import env
23 import robot_stepper_client
24 import csv_interface
25 
26 if len(sys.argv) == 7:
27  sarsa_table_file = sys.argv[1]
28  sarsa_policy_file = sys.argv[2]
29  total_episodes = int(sys.argv[3])
30  sarsa_performance_file = sys.argv[4]
31 else:
32  sarsa_table_file = "SARSA_table.csv"
33  sarsa_policy_file = "SARSA_policy.csv"
34  total_episodes = 100
35  sarsa_performance_file = "SARSA_performance.csv"
36 
37 print("Running for {} episodes".format(total_episodes))
38 
39 # Hyperparameters
40 max_steps = 100
41 learning_rate = 0.8
42 gamma = 0.1
43 
44 # Exploration/Exploitation
45 epsilon = 1.0
46 max_epsilon = 1.0
47 min_epsilon = 0.01
48 decay_rate = 0.1
49 
50 # Environment variables
51 action_size = env.nA
52 state_size = env.nS
53 qtable = np.zeros((state_size, action_size))
54 qtable_new = np.zeros((state_size, action_size))
55 
56 state_list = range(0, state_size)
57 action_list = range(0, action_size)
58 
59 csv_interface.writeQTableToCsv(sarsa_performance_file, np.array([("episode","reward","max_variation","epsilon")]) )
60 # Q training algorithm
61 for episode in range(total_episodes):
62  state = random.choice(state_list)
63  step = 0
64  done = False
65  total_rewards = 0
66  explored = 0
67  exploited = 0
68  max_variation = 0
69 
70  exp_exp_tradeoff = random.uniform(0, 1)
71  if exp_exp_tradeoff > epsilon:
72  action = np.argmax(qtable[state,:])
73  exploited += 1
74  else:
75  action = random.choice(action_list)
76  explored += 1
77 
78 
79  for step in range(max_steps):
80 
81  new_state, reward, done, info = robot_stepper_client.step(state, action, "False")
82 
83  exp_exp_tradeoff = random.uniform(0, 1)
84  if exp_exp_tradeoff > epsilon:
85  new_action = np.argmax(qtable[new_state,:])
86  exploited += 1
87  else:
88  new_action = random.choice(action_list)
89  explored += 1
90 
91 
92  qtable_new[state, action] = qtable[state, action] + learning_rate * (reward + gamma * (qtable[new_state,new_action ]) - qtable[state, action])
93  delta = abs (qtable_new[state, action] - qtable[state, action])
94  max_variation = max(max_variation, delta)
95  qtable[state, action] = qtable_new[state, action]
96 
97  state = new_state
98  action = new_action
99  total_rewards += reward
100 
101  if done:
102  break
103 
104  csv_interface.appendPerformaceData(sarsa_performance_file, np.array([(episode,total_rewards,max_variation,epsilon)]) )
105  # if total_rewards == 300:
106  # print("Rewards threshold reached, breaking at ep: {}!!".format(episode))
107  # # print("Exploited : {} Explored : {} Max_Varaition : {} Total_Reward: {}".format(exploited, explored, max_variation, total_rewards))
108  # print("Epsilon: {} Max_Varaition : {} Total_Reward: {}".format(epsilon, max_variation, total_rewards))
109  # break
110  if max_variation <= 0.001:
111  print("Min variation reached, breaking at ep: {}!!".format(episode))
112  # print("Exploited : {} Explored : {} Max_Varaition : {} Total_Reward: {}".format(exploited, explored, max_variation, total_rewards))
113  print("Epsilon: {} Max_Varaition : {} Total_Reward: {}".format(epsilon, max_variation, total_rewards))
114  break
115 
116 
117  if episode%10 == 0:
118  print("Episode #{}".format(episode))
119  # print("Exploited : {} Explored : {} Max_Varaition : {} Total_Reward: {}".format(exploited, explored, max_variation, total_rewards))
120  print("Epsilon: {} Max_Varaition : {} Total_Reward: {}".format(epsilon, max_variation, total_rewards))
121  policy = []
122  for row in qtable:
123  policy.append(np.argmax(row))
124  print("Extracted policy :")
125  print(policy)
126  # print(qtable)
127  print("")
128 
129 
130 
131  epsilon = min_epsilon + (max_epsilon - min_epsilon)*np.exp(-decay_rate*episode)
132 
133 # Display and save results
134 print("")
135 print("Q Table :")
136 print(qtable)
137 print("")
138 
139 policy = []
140 for row in qtable:
141  policy.append(np.argmax(row))
142 print("Extracted policy :")
143 print(policy)
144 
145 print("Saving sarsa policy to : {}".format(sarsa_policy_file))
146 csv_interface.writePolicyArrayToCsv(sarsa_policy_file, policy)
147 print("Saving sarsa table to : {}".format(sarsa_table_file))
148 csv_interface.writeQTableToCsv(sarsa_table_file, qtable)
149 print("Saving sarsa performance to : {}".format(sarsa_performance_file))
